DTFactory Class Reference

Class for creating DataTransform objects by string description. More...

DataTransform * dataTransformForString (const std::string &spec, PsBoard &board)
 Create a pointer to a new DataTransform object as described in the string specification.

Detailed Description

Class for creating DataTransform objects by string description.

Usual chipstream, pmadjuster and quantmethod string descriptions should work. Classes must implement the setParameter() function to be initialized properly.

Member Function Documentation

DataTransform * DTFactory::dataTransformForString ( const std::string &  spec,
PsBoard &  board 
)

Create a pointer to a new DataTransform object as described in the string specification.

Parameters:
spec - Specification string i.e. quant-norm.sketch=1000000, or med-polish.expon=true, etc.
Returns:
Pointer to new DataTransform objects, must be deleted when finished.
